Radiant Core Portable Distribution
===================================

This is a portable distribution of Radiant Core that should run on
any Windows 10/11 system without requiring additional installations.

To run Radiant Core:
1. Run radiantd.exe to start the daemon
2. Run radiant-cli.exe for command-line interface
3. Run radiant-tx.exe for transaction utilities

Configuration:
- Edit radiant.conf to configure the daemon
- The blockchain data will be stored in C:\Users\donma\AppData\Roaming\Radiant

Requirements:
- Windows 10/11
- Internet connection for blockchain synchronization

For more information, visit: https://radiantblockchain.org
